Package com.game.player

Class Frogger

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
com.application.Actor
com.game.player.FroggerProperties
com.game.player.Frogger
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class Frogger
extends FroggerProperties
Handles and reflects player's input.
Author:
hcywy2

  • Constructor Details

    • Frogger

      public Frogger()

  • Method Details

    • initialiseClasses

      public void initialiseClasses()
      Initialises MovementController and DeathController objects.

    • checkKeyEntered

      public void checkKeyEntered()
      Calls MovementController.handleKeyPressed(KeyEvent) and MovementController.handleKeyReleased(KeyEvent) to handle player's input.

    • act

      public void act​(long now)
      Continuously handles player's input and checks if death conditions are met. Calls checkKeyEntered(), DeathController.handleDeath(long) and DeathController.checkDeath() Conditions were added to slow down the refresh rate of the AnimationTimer.
      Overrides:
      act in class FroggerProperties
      Parameters:
      now - The timestamp of the current frame given in nanoseconds.

    • getChangeScore

      public boolean getChangeScore()
      Checks if the score is changed.
      Returns:
      changeScore.

    • setChangeScore

      public void setChangeScore​(boolean bool)
      Sets changeScore.

    • addPoints

      public void addPoints​(int p)
      Adds points to current score.
      Parameters:
      p - Points to add.

    • minusPoints

      public void minusPoints()
      Checks if current score is more than 50 and minus points accordingly.

    • setPoints

      public void setPoints​(int points)
      Sets points.
      Parameters:
      points - New Points.

    • getPoints

      public int getPoints()
      Gets points.

    • getStop

      public boolean getStop()
      Check if the level is cleared.
      Returns:
      True when all 5 Froggers has reached the end point.

    • addEnd

      public void addEnd()
      Adds end.
